item.treasurehunt.piece_two.tooltip: It has a mystical, almost magical quality
item.treasurehunt.piece_three.tooltip: Its faint green aura makes you shiver on touch
item.treasurehunt.piece_four.tooltip: You can't stop looking at the swirls of yellow dust inside its shell
item.treasurehunt.colour_wheel.tooltip: Though it, you see the whole world in a different way
